${ModID}:DroneSwarmRareSkill.NAME: Drone Swarm
${ModID}:DroneSwarmRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Raise your hand size this turn by !${ModID}:m2!. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.NAME: The Suckamid
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Retain your hand for !${ModID}:m2! turns. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Retain your hand for !${ModID}:m2! turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ElectromagneticBurstRarePower.NAME: Electromagnetic Burst
${ModID}:ElectromagneticBurstRarePower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.NAME: Arrow Storm
${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Attack cards in your hand. NL If you exhausted a card, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.NAME: Marvelous Feast
${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Add in order: ${ModID}:Croquettes that provide Block, Weak, Strength and Vulnerable to your hand. Once per turn ended.
${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Add in order, Upgraded: ${ModID}:Croquettes that provide Block, Weak, Strength and Vulnerable to your hand. Once per turn ended.

${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.NAME: Friendship Croquettes
${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Gain !B! Block, Exhaust. NL When Retained, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.NAME: Top of the Sky
${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Returns to your hand on play. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.NAME: Bucket Of Dregs
${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL When Retained, heal ALL enemies for !M! HP and gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.NAME: Pocket Tournament
${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, randomly, 2X times: NL Draw 1 card, gain [E] , gain 5 Vigor or gain 3 Block. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, randomly, 2X+2 times: NL Draw 1 card, gain [E] , gain 5 Vigor or gain 3 Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StoneSwordCommonAttack.NAME: Stone Sword
${ModID}:StoneSwordCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.NAME: Rea--dy!
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
